Container.Name: FileBrowser
Container.Overview:
File Browser - Webbased File Browser including sharing functions etc.
https://github.com/filebrowser/filebrowser
Just Mount other Folder to /srv Example /mnt/user/Media/ > /srv/Media /mnt/user/Docs/ > /srv/Docs
Updated for v2.33.0: - Database now lives in /database/filebrowser.db - Config/settings.json lives in same /database/ folder - Make sure to chown files to 1000:1000 if needed
Mounts: -v /mnt/user/appdata/filebrowser:/database -v /mnt/user/SHARE:/srv
